description:
Qualifications

Required:

  • Exceptional communication and organizational skills
  • Ability to manage multiple changing schedules in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
  • Proven ability to build consensus and work effectively within a cross-departmental team
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business or a combination of equivalent education, training and experience
  • Experienced in Microsoft Excel, Access, Outlook, and Mail merge
  • Experienced in a clinical setting and with clinical schedules.
  • Flexible schedule to host evening/weekend events or provide coverage

Preferred

  • Working knowledge of MedHub and QGenda systems
  • 1-2yrs of experience in active participation or leading wellness initiatives
  • 1-2yrs of experience in working with trainees
